overview: Rohit Shetty's new Desi Chinese Blockbuster featuring the one and only Ranveer Ching is ‘Made In India’! The mouth-watering entertainer features a bunch of women kidnapped by villains desperate to know the secret formula. And there’s only one true Desi Chinese Superhero who can rescue them – RANVEER CHING!  NOW RELEASED ALL OVER!
title: Made in India
